scripts.build:win32: swc src -d dist & copyfiles -a -u 1 ./src/**/!(*.ts) ./dist/ & copyfiles -a -u 1 ./config/ ./dist/config & copyfiles -a -u 1 ./src/mappings/ ./dist/mappings & copyfiles -a -u 1 ./src/plugins/ ./dist/plugins
scripts.build:darwin:linux: swc src -d dist && rsync -a --exclude '*.ts' ./src/ ./dist/ && rsync -a ./config/ ./dist/config && rsync -a ./src/mappings/ ./dist/mappings && rsync -a ./src/plugins/ ./dist/plugins
scripts.build:default: swc src -d dist && rsync -a --exclude '*.ts' ./src/ ./dist/ && rsync -a ./config/ ./dist/config && rsync -a ./src/mappings/ ./dist/mappings && rsync -a ./src/plugins/ ./dist/plugins
scripts.serve: nodemon --watch src --watch config --watch mappings --watch plugins -e ts,js,yaml,json,.env --exec "npm run build && npm run preview"
